abstract: A trial program will allow the authorities in four regions to issue bonds amid concerns about efforts by Beijing to tame inflation and a property bubble.
snippet: A trial program will allow the authorities in four regions to issue bonds amid concerns about efforts by Beijing to tame inflation and a property bubble.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — Amid worries that local governments in China may be running short of cash, Beijing gave approval Thursday to a trial program that will allow the authorities in four regions to issue bonds.

headline.main: China to Allow Some Local Governments to Issue Bonds
headline.print_headline: Local Cash Squeeze Leads Beijing to Allow Bond Sales
